comments.body: Why do we test `SessionWindowedSerde` in this test class? Same for the next 3 tests.
Seems it is a stale diff? `SessionWindowedSerde` has been completely removed.

Well. The tested `keySerde` is a `SessionWindowSerde`

https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/3307/files/0e3925a99857b1f17b9881d0b3aaaf5e4139d0db#diff-8650f75f1d517c7698d4d618d8cdf1a7R52

Thus, these tests should go to `WindowedSerdesTest` IMHO.
